Replace.Text: Exploring plots provides you with [ICON_RESOURCE_OIL] Oil [NewLine]
Miraculously returned from the sea of ​​fire!
Looking forward to the birth of a new overlord!
On the hour [ICON_RESOURCE_SOC_NITRO_FUEL] fuel drink [NewLine] loss of 20 health points (not fatal), reset movement
Not a drop left [NewLine] No, where is my [ICON_RESOURCE_SOC_NITRO_FUEL] fuel drink
There are no suitable cities nearby
The Boarmen of the Sons of Calydon are ready to work! [NewLine]
The training of new employees can be handed over to Acao (unit) [NewLine]
The construction of new buildings can be handed over to Amu (Architecture) [NewLine]
The planning of new areas can be handed over to Azhuan (area) [NewLine]
A Cao, A Mu, A Zhuan

Sons of Calydon special unit [NewLine] Acao/Amu/Azhuan can consume construction labor to provide 10% [ICON_PRODUCTION] production progress for units/buildings/areas [NewLine] Acao, Amu, Azhuan drinking [ICON_RESOURCE_SOC_NITRO_FUEL] fuel will restore 1 construction labor
I'm here: When the pioneers and builders finish moving, if there are strategic resources within 2 blocks around them, all [ICON_MOVEMENT] movement power will be restored
I see: All strategic resources are initially visible. At the beginning of each round, you can obtain oil resources [ICON_RESOURCE_OIL] equal to the number of cells explored in the previous round.
Pig Rush: Attack the wall and deal full damage. If the damage dealt in the battle is higher, push the enemy defense unit to the space behind it.

Overlord: +20 [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength, +4 [ICON_MOVEMENT] Movement, only 50% of experience is required to be promoted, promotion will summon 1 biker, and abdicate when the next Inferno Ride is completed
Triumph: +3 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat strength for each valid ally

Son of Calydon Special Wonder [NewLine] Obtain 2 [ICON_RESOURCE_SOC_FIRE] Ignition Stones, provide 6 [ICON_RESOURCE_OIL] Oil per turn, generate [ICON_RESOURCE_OIL] Oil in the surrounding resource-free plots [NewLine] After completing the Inferno Ride, the next Light Cavalry or Heavy Cavalry that enters the Burning Crystal Lake will be teleported to the capital and become the Overlord

The Son of Calydon special area [NewLine] provides [ICON_FOOD] food, [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity, [ICON_Amenities] habitability [NewLine] and will automatically convert 1 [ICON_RESOURCE_OIL] oil into [ICON_RESOURCE_SOC_NITRO_FUEL] fuel drink at the end of the round.
+{1_num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture from adjacent mountains and deserts
+{1_num} [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production comes from adjacent mountains and deserts
+{1_num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold coins come from adjacent areas

Light Cavalry, replaces the Rider, unlocks earlier, requires [ICON_RESOURCE_OIL] oil for maintenance, has relatively higher base [ICON_STRENGTH] combat strength and [ICON_MOVEMENT] mobility, +3 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat strength for each valid ally
A Cao can consume construction labor to provide 10% [ICON_PRODUCTION] production progress
Amu can consume construction labor to provide 10% [ICON_PRODUCTION] production progress for buildings
A brick can consume construction labor to provide 10% [ICON_PRODUCTION] production progress for the region

The Son of Calydon special project requires 2 [ICON_RESOURCE_SOC_FIRE] Ignition Stones to be held. [ICON_RESOURCE_SOC_FIRE] Ignition Stones can be obtained by completing the specified technology [NewLine] to provide a large amount of [ICON_GOLD] gold coins, a moderate amount of [ICON_FAITH] faith value, a moderate amount of [ICON_CULTURE] culture value, and a small amount of [ICON_SCIENCE] science value [NewLine] After running, the Burning Crystal Lake will be revitalized, and the plots with [ICON_RESOURCE_OIL] oil resources will be +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity

When the pioneers and builders finish moving, if there are strategic resources within the surrounding 2 squares, all [ICON_MOVEMENT] movement will be restored [NewLine] All strategic resources are initially visible, and at the beginning of each round, they can obtain the amount of oil equal to the number of cells explored in the previous round [NewLine] No war weariness will be generated, and light cavalry and heavy cavalry will attack the city wall and cause full damage. If the damage output in the battle is higher, the enemy defense unit will be pushed to the position behind it.
I come, I see, I knock away!
Triumph: +3 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat strength for each valid ally
